title: 11/02/20 DPS-BEST OF
itunes:title: 11/02/20 DPS-BEST OF
description:
On today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps all the weekends' actions from the NFL and College Football. Are the Steelers and Ravens the NFL's last real rivalry? Could this be the year the ACC gets 2 teams into the College Football Playoffs? We're joined by the MMQB's Albert Breer and NBC Sports' Peter King. Plus, DP recalls a story about Steph Curry and Mark Jackson

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
